name: 2 Hour Project: Space Invader
description:
Goal: Survive as long as possible.

Controls: Left - Right: Move  -------- Space: Fire

Thoughts: 

I made this during a live stream where I tasked myself to make space invaders in 2 hours. 

The idea is that you can't kill the aliens, only push them back.

The longer you don't shoot a alien, the faster it moves (in theory i don't know if that works) 

Version 2:

- Added new mechanic om shooting, charging shots cause different effects
